description: My one bedroom apartment in Red Hook is perfect for someone looking for a home away from home for the holidays. The kitchen comes stocked with everything you'd need to cook meals and Fairway Market is just a few blocks away. There are excellent coffee shops, restaurants, and bars within walking distance. Manhattan is a short bus and train ride away. You'll be living in a quiet neighborhood with a waterfront view of the Statue of Liberty a few blocks away.
name: Charming One Bedroom in Red Hook BK
